scenario_text.value:
(Something like animal hair is stuck here?
But if I can only see it with my camera...)
(Then this must belong to a Kemonogami.)

You’re right, Agumon. Something doesn’t feel
right here.

Be careful, Takuma. No telling when they’ll
attack.

(There’s traces of the thing so close, but it
hasn’t come to attack us. Why not?)

(Did it just happen to pass by? Or is it
waiting for a chance to strike?)
